tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ConflictResolution (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_content TEXT,
    date_created TIMESTAMP,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Conflict_Resolution_Users (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
	email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
	password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	created_on TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Conflict_Resolution_Documents (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255),
  document_content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  last_modified_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Conflict_Parties (
  party_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  party_name VARCHAR(255),
  party_type VARCHAR(50),
  contact_person VARCHAR(100),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Disputes (
  dispute_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  dispute_type VARCHAR(50),
  dispute_description TEXT,
  party1_id INT,
  party2_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (party1_id) REFERENCES Conflict_Parties(party_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (party2_id) REFERENCES Conflict_Parties(party_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ConflictResolutionUsers (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
password VARCHAR(50),
email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE ConflictResolutionCases (case_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
case_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
case_description TEXT,
date_started DATE);

CREATE TABLE ConflictResolutionDocuments (doc_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
doc_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
doc_content TEXT,
doc_type VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE ConflictResolutionParties (party_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
party_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
party_type VARCHAR(50),
party_contact VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE conflicts (
    conflict_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    conflict_description TEXT,
    disputed_parties VARCHAR(255),
    resolution_status VARCHAR(50),
    resolution_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE resolution_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    conflict_id INT,
    resolution_details TEXT,
    resolution_date TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_conflict_id FOREIGN KEY (conflict_id) REFERENCES conflicts(conflict_id)
);
